metadata.title: Tstars Anime Hoodie Gifts for Men Women Novelty Unisex Sweatshirt Pullover Hoodies
features: Anime hoodie for men and women; It's an Anime thing you wouldn't understand. Great everyday casual wear for manga fans

Gift ideas for birthday, christmas or a present for any occasion; makes a nice present for your son, daughter, nephew, niece, grandson or granddaughter or anyone who is into anime. A fun way to celebrate this special day
Feature: quality basic wear printed garment; Comfort style made of friendly material, soft, comfortable and breathable. Casual and standard fit ideal for hot or cold seasons

Print and designs: quality graphic apparel, durable to endure regular wear and frequent washings. This solid color garment is decorated with a front print, using direct to garment or screen printing, cured properly so it sets into the garment. Available in a great range of colors. Designed and printed locally in USA

Fit and sizing: we recommend referring to the size chart in the photo gallery so that you can choose the most suitable size. Choose color from the drop-down list. Wash cold before wearing. Non-chlorine bleach, when needed. We recommend tumble dry, medium heat. Do not iron the decoration
description: 50/50 preshrunk cotton/polyester, Heather Sport colors: 40/60 cotton/polyester, Air jet yarn for softer feel and reduced pilling, Double-lined hood with color-matched drawcord, Double-needle stitching at shoulders, armholes, neck, waistband and cuffs, Double-needle pouch pocket for added reinforcement, 1 x 1 rib with spandex for enhanced stretch and recovery.
